output:
Gonna take you on an ambient journey Gonna take you through an ambient night
Flying through the landscape of your imagination Now close your eyes
Listen to your heart It pulses like an engine
Beating like a drum But there is something missing
Imagination gives the fuel It gives the mind the ignition
The people live in the landscape The atmosphere the vision
